phrases: My shower scenes lack sexiness, apparently.
Oh, you are talking about your manga...
Not bad as a love scene.
Do I really look that sexy right now?!
I think I get it now.
To my room to continue drawing.
You are leaving the shower like that?
The deadline for the New Artist Award is not far off.
Cannot you at least respond to what I said?!
Go back to your room and work on your manu
Who is the one that needs to work hard?
I have told you several times already.
It is impossible for Kamiigusa Misaki to work in a group.
She is the type to suddenly draw up storyboards...
in her head and start animating.
And another thing: I am not Misaki's manager,
so please do not send me work for her.
Hey, that is some expression you have got.
You would think I was voiding something critical,
considering how smooth my daily bowel movements are.
You would be in serious trouble if you were expelling love or dreams.
That was a producer from an anime studio.
Said they want to give Misaki a better script for her next project.
In other words, my scripts do not measure up to her talents.
It is not as if they need to tell me that, though.
Why do not you have a seat?
You are bothered by the fact that the girl you thought...
could not do a thing without you is actually...
the only one who does not have anything...
Misaki-senpai has her anime, and you have your scripts...
Even Akasaka works as a programmer.
You have received a message from Company S.
I guess you could call them goals,
or maybe just what you want to do...
The only one in Sakura Hall, huh?
Sorata, you are moving out of Sakura Hall, are not you?
Is that Escape from Sakura Hall!
you hung in your room a joke?
I am going to return to the regular dorms for sure.
As soon as I find an owner for the cats.
You have not really been looking lately, have you?
Right now, I have got my hands full taking care of Shiina
If you are going to leave,
I will take this off your hands.
Is there still something holding you back?
Sorata, do not place the blame on someone else.
I will take care of Mashiro-chan and the cats.
you will be able to decide what you want to do, too.
I am tired of listening to you pretending you are leaving.
I will find someone to take the cats!
You are still just a kid if you take your anger out...
on kouhai who are down in the dumps.
You would better follow up on that.
Your big chance to turn your idea into a game!
Our panel of judges includes prominent figures from the game industry and designers from major game companies!
Kanda Sorata : Akasaka, do you have a minute?
Akasaka Ryunosuke : Sure, I just finished checking my motion control engine.
There is something I want to ask you.
Kanda Sorata : How did you know that?!
Akasaka Ryunosuke : Because you are in the middle of reading a website about making games.
Because you are in the middle of reading...
Why do not you start by telling me how someone holed up...
in the next room can possibly know that?!
Kanda Sorata : Why do not you start by telling me how someone holed up in the next room can possibly know that?!
Akasaka Ryunosuke : What answer is there, other than hacking?
What answer is there, other than hacking?
That is nothing to brag about!
That is nothing to brag about!
Akasaka Ryunosuke : So, what do you want to know?
What do I need to do to become a game creator?
Looking for Owners Please contact Kanda Sorata in Class 2-1 for details.
You are looking for owners, huh?
So, you have finally decided to move out.
I will go put them up over there.
Did something good happen to Aoyama?
I will go ask the Swimming Club if they want some cats.
I found someone who wants to take the cats, but...
I will be the cats' owner.
You are the one who needs an owner!
K-Kanda-kun, what do you mean by owner?
I mean Shiina needs someone to take care of her...
because she is not used to attending a Japanese high school yet!
H-How can you confess your feelings to him so easily?
There is somewhere I want to go this Sunday.
O-Oh, that is what you meant...
I am busy looking for an owner.
H-Hey, Kanda-kun, are you sure about that?
It is got nothing to do with me.
Something is going to pop out!
What is all this ruckus on a Sunday?
Mashiron and Jin are going on a date!
Who cares if they go on a date?
They said they are going to a love hotel!
Do not you care if Mashiron cheats on you?
I am sure they just went to get material for her manga.
Why are you guys making such a big fuss?
Do you really believe that playboy Jin-san would go...
all the way to a love hotel and not try anything?
Well, it is pretty certain Mitaka will do something.
Kouhai-kun, get dressed and meet me at the front door!
I will be there in 60 seconds!
I wonder if we will be celebrating tonight.
Take the weights off your arms!
I am going as fast as I can...
I still have three more stages of transformation!
This is why earthlings are no good!
So, you really are an alien.
They are nearby, so let us be careful.
Kouhai-kun, is this how they are getting their material?
Kouhai-kun, that is because you are not paying attention,
Why did you say that twice?!
Kouhai-kun, I cannot take any more!
You are going to make me hurl...
My overwhelming feelings are about to bubble over!
What are we going to do if they notice us?
We will pretend we just happened to run into them!
That is not much of a plan!
I work here on Sundays, after going to training school.
You look wonderful in your uniform!
Come on, let us hide together!
K-Kanda-kun, you are getting too close.
You are going to keep it?
Someone close, and yet so far...
Excuse me, one of these, please.
They bought something, did not they?
I need to get back to work.
I would work hard even if you did not tell me to.
I do not have to be the one who looks after Shiina...
Do you think pretty, quiet girls are Jin-san's type?
That is what Fuuka-chan, the first girl he dated, was like.
You have been stalking him since the beginning?
I would have known even if I had not.
Why am I never the one standing next to Jin?
Senpai, we have to stop them!
What the hell are you doing?!
Am I lying on your lap?
Then, do not say it does!
Do not just let people lie in your lap!
I was thinking about the world.
That is a lot to think about!
He told me it was just like he planned, and that you would take care of me now.
Did he know we were stalking you?
I am going to take a bath.
We are a man and a woman in a love hotel room!
You do not understand at all, do you?
You need to think a little more before you act.
What are you going to do if you come here...
with a guy and something happens?
Even if I think more, I only came here for reference.
This is necessary to be able to draw.
That is why I came here.
Did you find someone to take the cats?
You are the one who does not understand.
What kind of life have you been living up to now?
I meant to let you get a punch in,
but my reflexes did not let me.
Jin-san, where are you right now?
Please go back to Sakura Hall today.
I cannot see Misaki-senpai like this anymore.
You had to go and say it.
What is cannot it be Misaki-senpai?
When I see her looking all depressed,
I want to do her like crazy.
She is sleeping in the bed by herself.
I am sandwiched between the shoe rack and the wall.
It was not even a fight.
I took an instant kill combo, and it was over.
Shiina's crazy, and none of my common sense...
But Shiina did not care about any of that.
and now, drawing manga are everything to her.
I guess you could say she has no uncertainties...
In any case, she is amazing.
she came to Japan to become a manga artist.
When I told her that was a waste, considering...
the praise her talents had earned her as a painter,
she said she did not care about that.
But, thanks to Shiina, my eyes are finally open.
I will decide for myself where I want to be.
I will throw you one hell of a farewell party.
I really was the one who did not understand.
Next time you ask me, I promise I will go out with you, so...
Good luck with the New Artist Award.
You are leaving Sakura Hall, are not you?
How dare you ask me something so dirty?!
Do not try to imagine them either!
